es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.diversity.sales.metrics

Class AbstractSalesDiversityMetric<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.AbstractSystemMetric<U,I>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.diversity.sales.metrics.AbstractSalesDiversityMetric<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SystemMetric<U,I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EIUDC, EIUFD, EIURD, GiniIndex

    public abstract class AbstractSalesDiversityMetric<U,I>
extends AbstractSystemMetric<U,I>
    Abstract sales diversity metrics. It handles the counting of how many times an item is recommended.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
